content:
Sure, here are a few recommendations for laptops with 8GB of RAM:

1. Dell Inspiron 14 5000: This laptop has 8GB of RAM and runs on an 11th generation Intel Core processor. It also has a 14-inch FHD display, and a battery life of up to 9 hours. 2. HP Pavilion 14: This laptop has 8GB of RAM and is powered by a 10th generation Intel Core processor. It features a 14-inch FHD display, and has a battery life of up to 8 hours. 3. ASUS VivoBook 15: This laptop has 8GB of RAM and is powered by an AMD Quad-Core R5-3500U processor. It features a 15.6-inch FHD display, and has a battery life of up to 9 hours. 4. Lenovo Ideapad 3: This laptop has 8GB of RAM and is powered by an AMD Ryzen 5 3500U processor. It features a 14-inch FHD display, and has a battery life of up to 6 hours. All of these laptops are great options for multitasking and come with 8GB of RAM. However, there are many other laptops available with similar specifications, so be sure to do some research before making a purchase.
